Store-Deletion-Confirmation-Message: Are you sure you want to delete the store? This action cannot be undone.
Add-Store-Description: Please enter the store name and administrator details. These details will be used when signing into the store portal.
Edit-Store-Description: Store administrator's details cannot be edited. You are permitted to only rename your store
Validation-Error-Message1: Password must contain minimum 12 characters and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
Validation-Error-Message2: Username can only consist of alphabets, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
Please-enter-the-valid-email-address: Please enter the valid email address
Name: Name
Store-Logo-Info: This logo will be used as Store's logo
Search-Logo-Info: The search icon will be visible in areas where the search functionality is implemented
Customer-Logo-info: This image will be displayed as the default avatar for customers
Cart-Logo-info: The cart icon will be visible in areas where the cart functionality is implemented
Wishlist-Logo-Info: The wishlist icon will be visible in areas where the wishlist functionality is implemented
Banner-Logo-Info: These images will be used in the carousel of the store front
Sample-Preview-Page-For-Store-Front: Sample Preview Page For Store Front
